description: Showcases all Generative UI section types and layouts for human-in-the-loop interactions

inputs_schema.topic: Topic for the demo (e.g., 'product launch', 'data review', 'design feedback')

phases.name: showcase_image_section
phases.instructions:
Demonstrate the IMAGE section type.

Topic: {{ input.topic }}

1. First, create a relevant chart using create_chart
2. Then use ask_human_custom to display the image and ask for feedback

Example call:
```
ask_human_custom(
  question="What do you think of this chart?",
  context="I created this visualization for {{ input.topic }}",
  images=["<path to chart>"],
  ui_hint="image_review"
)
```

phases.name: showcase_data_table
phases.instructions:
Demonstrate the DATA_TABLE section type.

Use ask_human_custom with structured data to show an interactive data table.

Example call:
```
ask_human_custom(
  question="Please review this data and select any rows that need attention",
  data={
    "columns": ["Name", "Status", "Priority", "Due Date"],
    "rows": [
      ["Task A", "Pending", "High", "2025-01-15"],
      ["Task B", "In Progress", "Medium", "2025-01-20"],
      ["Task C", "Blocked", "Critical", "2025-01-10"]
    ]
  },
  ui_hint="data_review"
)
```

phases.name: showcase_comparison
phases.instructions:
Demonstrate the COMPARISON section type.

Use ask_human_custom with options to show side-by-side comparison cards.

Example call:
```
ask_human_custom(
  question="Which approach do you prefer?",
  context="Here are two strategies for {{ input.topic }}",
  options=[
    {
      "id": "option_a",
      "title": "Conservative Approach",
      "description": "Lower risk, steady progress",
      "pros": ["Safe", "Predictable"],
      "cons": ["Slower", "Less innovative"]
    },
    {
      "id": "option_b",
      "title": "Aggressive Approach",
      "description": "Higher risk, faster results",
      "pros": ["Fast", "Innovative"],
      "cons": ["Risky", "Resource intensive"]
    }
  ],
  ui_hint="comparison"
)
```

phases.name: showcase_layout
phases.instructions:
Demonstrate LAYOUT options with multiple sections.

Use ask_human_custom with layout_hint to arrange multiple content types.

Example with sidebar layout:
```
ask_human_custom(
  question="Review this dashboard and provide your feedback",
  context="This combines multiple data sources for {{ input.topic }}",
  images=["<chart path>"],
  data={
    "columns": ["Metric", "Value"],
    "rows": [["Total", 1250], ["Active", 890], ["Pending", 360]]
  },
  options=[
    {"id": "approve", "label": "Approve"},
    {"id": "revise", "label": "Request Revision"},
    {"id": "reject", "label": "Reject"}
  ],
  layout_hint="sidebar"
)
```

phases.name: finalize
phases.instructions:
Summarize the human's feedback from all showcased UI components.

Review the feedback stored in state and provide a comprehensive summary of:
1. Image review feedback
2. Data table selections
3. Comparison choices
4. Layout interaction results

Present the final summary to the user.
